data.name: Guardians of Middle-earth: Smaug's Treasure
data.detailed_description:
• Horde an exclusive relic that when equipped, boosts your in-game gold and experience.
  • As a bonus get 80,000 Gold for use in-game.
data.about_the_game:
• Horde an exclusive relic that when equipped, boosts your in-game gold and experience.
  • As a bonus get 80,000 Gold for use in-game.
data.short_description: Horde an exclusive relic that when equipped, boosts your in-game gold and experience.As a bonus get 80,000 Gold for use in-game.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 32-bit: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo, 2.4 GHz | AMD Athlon X2, 2.8 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GTS | AMD Radeon 3850 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Windows XP and DirectX® 9.0c and below not supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 750, 2.67 GHz | AMD Phenom II X4 965, 3.4GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 | AMD Radeon HD 6950 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Windows XP and DirectX® 9.0c and below not supported
